재밌는데 재미없음

This game could be so awesome. The idea of it is great, it's fun to play with friends and there's new content released every few months. 
So far so good. But here comes the big problem:

The Community.
Dead by Daylight has the most toxic community I know, not gonna lie.
On one hand you have toxic players on both sides - Survivors that play against each other instead of working together and killers that are just downright a**holes, camping and tunneling.
On the other hand you have the developers, doing nothing to get rid of toxic players (or at least that's how it feels like). The report system is simply useless, the best way to prevent playing with bad/toxic players is to simply block them on steam, and yes, that is justt as hilarious as it sounds.  

Honestly, if you just want to have some fun playing alone or with friends search for any other game. The game gets worse with every rank you climb up, and you have no chance not to get better ranks since this game doesn't have a "normal"/not ranked mode :)

So there's that. 
In conclusion: I love the idea, I really. really loved this game (as you can see if you have a look at my playtime), but it is simply not enjoyable in it's current state. and I'm not even talking about the countless bugs or the lack of support by the developers - I'm simply talking about this sh*thole of a community.

Maybe these guys should learn that games exist so people can have fun together, not to just ruin someone's day for your own enjoyment.
This game is a very interesting one. It seems like it is balanced enough, minus a couple days after rank reset. I love this and its a majority of what I play. 10/10

If you don't mind losing this is the game for you, its creepy and fun but also pretty frustrating. Killers can pick you up and put you down for a solid 5 minutes if you are the only 2 survivors while down. Other survivors can be garbage too. The DLC model is fine I suppose this game rewards focus in one or two characters because progression can be slow if you are upgrading multiple survivors at once. My final thoughts "If you wanna play a horror movie play this"

！！千万别信刷血点的沙口，千万别信刷血点的沙口，千万别信刷血点的沙口！！
想要血点的萌新可以把号借我玩玩，我给你们打，没有杀机玩我要死了，我是啥比。

Oyun gayet başarılı,eğlenceli. Gösterilen sistem gereksinimlerinin altında bir bilgisayardan oynayabilirsiniz. tek sıkıntı katiller astıkları adamlarının başında ölünceye kadar bekliyorlar. bu duruma bir çare getirmeleri lazım, bir dez avantaş. Bence katiller astıkları adamların yanında spotlanmış olarak gösterilebilir. Ya da katilin adamı astığı yerde katil yavaşlatılmalı. Aksi taktirde oyun zevkini 0'a düşürüyorlar. Son olarak oyuna bir klasik rekabetçi mod getirilebilir. porkler vs. olmadan, sadece katil ve kaçakalr olarak oyun oynanabilir. Emeğinize sağlık güzel bir oyun yapmışsınız.

Ok, time for serious review on patch 4.7.0. This game still fun AF, yeah if you were playing as a survivor. Then how about you playin as a killer? Man i just wanna to kill myself. Im not a good killer, im still on green rank but it;s already frustrating as hell. 

First thing first, i think the dev should do something about gen rush, especially on early game. It's really really frustrating when you catch a survivor for around 30 second and boom 1 gen already done, another 30 seconds pass and another gen have already done. Many of you and the dev (maybe) think i am as a noob killer, sucks at playing killer, don't know what to do, etc. But im not true talent, otzdarva, or another good player when they are playing as a killer.

I don't mind if the dev wanted to add more objective as a survivor, and i believe you can easly tell the difference between red rank survivor and red rank killer, especially rank 1 killer. But not everyone can reach red rank as a killer right? 

I know balancing is not easy, but please do something about this. (sorry for bad english)

Я пушил бараки, пока все сражались, в доте и получал молчаливые репорты. Я делал эйсы в форс раундах, в кс и получал лишь "читы офф". Я выигрывал матчи в пабге, форточке и др. рояль играх без килов и получал всего лишь дизлайк на скрине. НО ЗДЕСЬ.. такого кол-ва нытиков, жопогорения и токсичности, как тут - я нигде не встречал.. столько сообщений в личку и на стену..такое внимание.. такой негатив..ммм..ОБОЖАЮ эту игру..лучше, чем секс
